evidence.source_document: Plaintiffs' Motion for a Preliminary Injunction
evidence.text: MOTION for Preliminary Injunction by NATIONAL ACADEMY OF EDUCATION, NATIONAL COUNCIL ON MEASUREMENT IN EDUCATION.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction: filed by NATIONAL ACADEMY OF EDUCATION, NATIONAL COUNCIL ON MEASUREMENT IN EDUCATION, requesting the court to issue a preliminary injunction pending hearing, filed 2025-05-02.

Defendants' Motion to Stay Proceedings: filed by DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION, LINDA MCMAHON, requesting the court to stay all proceedings pending hearing on Plaintiffs' motion for preliminary injunction, filed 2025-05-05.

evidence.text: 2025-06-30 | Order on Motion for Briefing Schedule AND Set/Reset Deadlines ... Defendants' motion to dismiss is due by September 18, 2025.

extracted.value: Defendants' Motion to Dismiss: filed by DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION and Linda McMahon, requesting the dismissal of the case, due September 18, 2025.
